content: Can you describe the project a bit more?
Okay, I'll get started on fixing the shop now alerting.

Fix the shop now button so that it alerts again
Sure, I will fix the shop now button to alert again.

Update the shop now button so that when pressed it will alert in the browser with the message 'shopping now!'
